title: Thunderbird Mobiel voor Android.
creator: altijdvrij17
content:
Hallo,

Waar komen of staan Mijn Mappen in Thunderbird Mobiel voor Android?

Is het mogelijk om deze mappen lokaal op smartphone of tablet te zetten? Dit voor archivering van de mail.

Bedankt, AV

title: local mail folder on amdrpif
creator: john608
content: I have been a Thunderbird user for many years both on Windows and Linux. Both gives me the option to copy mails to local folder on the pc. Thus I avoid having old mails stored on an external mail server. Will this option be available on android? Best Regards, John Kjersgaard

title: Printing of Mails
creator: pliopt.tt
content: How can I print a mail in Thunderbird for Android? I couldn't find a direct way and no option via share. Many thanks.
